## TextureAtlasManager.getAtlasTexture() method

Gets the atlas texture of a given index

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAtlasTexture(index: number): Texture2D;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | Index of the atlas bin |

**Returns:**

[Texture2D](doc/markdown/./device.texture2d.md)

Atlas texture for given index
